MemoryInfobox.description: 'Nesaia, the legendary huntress of Boeotia, was marked by Kassandra. For the first time in her life, the hunter had become the hunted.'

General_Description: '''The Last Hunt of Nesaia''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra hunted down the huntress [[Nesaia]] in the forests of [[Boeotia]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found Nesaia with her [[bear]] at her camp hidden in the woods east of [[Thebes, Greece|Thebes]]. *'''Kassandra:''' ''There stalks the mighty hunter.'' Kassandra engaged the champion and slew her. (If Nesaia is not at her camp.)
Kassandra examined the area for clues of her whereabouts. She started with the hut—at the entrance of the camp. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This hut must be Nesaia's. I guess she prefers the quiet of the forest over living in the city.'' She then approached the campfire inwards. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This fire's fresh, and the food still simmering. Nesaia can't be far away.'' Kassandra noticed a bloody track on the road exiting the camp. *'''Kassandra:''' ''These tracks don't look [[human]]. They lead away from the camp to the north.'' Following the trail, [[Ikaros]] tracked down Nesaia with her bear near a watchtower near a river, or at the [[Healing Sanctuary of Amphiaraos]]. *'''Kassandra:''' ''There stalks the mighty hunter.'' Kassandra engaged the champion and slew her.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra slew Nesaia, one of Boeotia's champions, as part of her campaign to secure the region for Sparta.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

[[fr:La dernière chasse de Nesaia]]

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra found Nesaia with her [[bear]] at her camp hidden in the woods east of [[Thebes, Greece|Thebes]].
Kassandra engaged the champion and slew her.
(If Nesaia is not at her camp.)
Kassandra examined the area for clues of her whereabouts. She started with the hut—at the entrance of the camp.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This hut must be Nesaia's. I guess she prefers the quiet of the forest over living in the city.''
She then approached the campfire inwards.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This fire's fresh, and the food still simmering. Nesaia can't be far away.''
Kassandra noticed a bloody track on the road exiting the camp.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''These tracks don't look [[human]]. They lead away from the camp to the north.''
Following the trail, [[Ikaros]] tracked down Nesaia with her bear near a watchtower near a river, or at the [[Healing Sanctuary of Amphiaraos]].
Kassandra engaged the champion and slew her.
